Body: Possible Duplicate:  How does Google Maps estimate my location without GPS?  I was wondering how Google Maps on my Android phone can locate me with a good accuracy when my GPS is disabled.At first I though it was with the cell tower but I'm not sure it can achieve this precision and it is way better when the wireless is enabled.Experiment that i did.If GPS is OFF and Wifi is ON = Perfect locationIf Wifi is ON GPS OFF = Still Perfect locationIf Wifi is OFF and GPS is ON =  location is not precise.Tested this with 5 -6 PhonesAny Idea why ?
Title: How can Google Maps accurately locate my phone when GPS is disabled?

history.Text: I was wondering how Google Maps on my Android phone can locate me with a good accuracy when my GPS is disabled.At first I though it was with the cell tower but I'm not sure it can achieve this precision and it is way better when the wireless is enabled.Experiment that i did. 1. If GPS is OFF and Wifi is ON = Perfect location 2. If Wifi is ON GPS OFF = Still Perfect location 3. If Wifi is OFF and GPS is ON =  location is not precise.Tested this with 5 -6 PhonesAny Idea why ?
How can Google Maps accurately locate my phone when GPS is disabled?
